entry.title: Announcing Apache Pinot 0.10
entry.id: Announcing Apache Pinot 0.10
entry.summary: Learn more about the release of Apache Pinot 0.10 and all of new features that have been included in this version of the product.

entry.title: Text analytics on LinkedIn Talent Insights using Apache Pinot
entry.id: Text analytics on LinkedIn Talent Insights using Apache Pinot
entry.summary: Introduction LinkedIn Talent Insights (LTI) is a platform that helps organizations understand the external labor market and their internal workforce, and enables the long term success of their employees

entry.title: Introduction to Geospatial Queries in Apache Pinot
entry.id: Introduction to Geospatial Queries in Apache Pinot
entry.summary: Discuss the challenges of analyzing geospatial at scale and propose the geospatial support in Pinot.

entry.title: Automating Merchant Live Monitoring with Real-Time Analytics - Charon
entry.id: Automating Merchant Live Monitoring with Real-Time Analytics - Charon
entry.summary: Focus on Uber’s real-time data platform components to build a tool called Charon to reduce impact of poor marketplace reliability on the merchants.

entry.title: Deploying Apache Pinot at a Large Retail Chain
entry.id: Deploying Apache Pinot at a Large Retail Chain
entry.summary: Blog gives an overview of our use of Apache Pinot to solve some of biggest challenges around Data Analytics in Large Retail Chain

entry.title: Solving for the cardinality of set intersection at scale with Pinot and Theta Sketches
entry.id: Solving for the cardinality of set intersection at scale with Pinot and Theta Sketches
entry.summary: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

entry.title: Introduction to Upserts in Apache Pinot
entry.id: Introduction to Upserts in Apache Pinot
entry.summary: Introduction to Pinot Upsert and explain why it’s exciting and how you can start using it.

entry.title: Real-time Analytics with Presto and Apache Pinot
entry.id: Real-time Analytics with Presto and Apache Pinot
entry.summary: Blog gives an overview of our use of Apache Pinot to solve some of biggest challenges around Data Analytics in Large Retail Chain

entry.title: Change Data Analysis with Debezium and Apache Pinot
entry.id: Change Data Analysis with Debezium and Apache Pinot
entry.summary: Pinot enters into a storied legacy of innovations that have emerged from one of the world’s largest online social networks. Over a few decades, the Silicon Valley tech giant has helped hundreds of millions of people around the world navigate their careers.

entry.title: From Lambda to Lambda-less Lessons learned
entry.id: From Lambda to Lambda-less Lessons learned
entry.summary: The Lambda architecture has become a popular architectural style that promises both speed and accuracy in data processing by using a hybrid approach of both batch processing and stream processing methods.

entry.title: Operating Apache Pinot at Uber Scale
entry.id: Operating Apache Pinot at Uber Scale
entry.summary: Present details of this platform and how it fits in Uber’s ecosystem. Explain how uber scaled from a few use cases to a multi-cluster powering hundreds of use cases for querying terabyte-scale data with millisecond latencies.

entry.title: Deep Analysis of Russian Twitter Trolls
entry.id: Deep Analysis of Russian Twitter Trolls
entry.summary: Show you how to use Apache Pinot and Superset to analyze 3 million tweets by the Internet Research Agency (IRA) open-sourced by FiveThirtyEight.

entry.title: Leverage Plugins to Ingest Parquet Files from S3 in Pinot
entry.id: Leverage Plugins to Ingest Parquet Files from S3 in Pinot
entry.summary: Pinot is its pluggable architecture. The plugins make it easy to add support for any third-party system which can be an execution framework, a filesystem, or input format.

entry.title: Monitoring Apache Pinot with JMX, Prometheus and Grafana
entry.id: Monitoring Apache Pinot with JMX, Prometheus and Grafana
entry.summary: Blog gives an overview of our use of Apache Pinot to solve some of biggest challenges around Data Analytics in Large Retail Chain

entry.title: Achieving 99th percentile latency SLA using Apache Pinot
entry.id: Achieving 99th percentile latency SLA using Apache Pinot
entry.summary: How users can build critical site-facing analytical applications requiring high throughput and strict p99th query latency SLA

entry.title: Utilize UDFs to Supercharge Queries in Apache Pinot
entry.id: Utilize UDFs to Supercharge Queries in Apache Pinot
entry.summary: Scalar Functions that allow users to write and add their functions as a plugin.

entry.title: Building a culture around metrics and anomaly detection
entry.id: Building a culture around metrics and anomaly detection
entry.summary: ThirdEye as a system is a platform that allows you to integrate your metrics (quantitative information) with events (knowledge or qualitative information) and combine the two so you can distinguish between meaningless anomalies and those ones that matter.

entry.summary: Pinot enters into a storied legacy of innovations that have emerged from one of the world’s largest online social networks. Over a few decades, the Silicon Valley tech giant has helped hundreds of millions of people around the world navigate their careers.

entry.summary: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

entry.title: Using Apache Pinot and Kafka to Analyze GitHub Events
entry.id: Using Apache Pinot and Kafka to Analyze GitHub Events
entry.summary: Show you how Pinot and Kafka can be used together to ingest, query, and visualize event streams sourced from the public GitHub API.

entry.title: Engineering SQL Support on Apache Pinot at Uber
entry.id: Engineering SQL Support on Apache Pinot at Uber
entry.summary: Talks about solution that linked Presto, a query engine that supports full ANSI SQL, and Pinot, a real-time OLAP (online analytical processing) datastore.

entry.summary: Focus on using large set intersection cardinality approximations with Apache Pinot and Theta Sketches, which allow us to efficiently figure out the unique size of a targeted audience when factoring in multiple criteria of an advertising campaign.

entry.title: Star-tree index - Powering fast aggregations on Pinot
entry.id: Star-tree index - Powering fast aggregations on Pinot
entry.summary: Introduced Star-Tree index to utilize the pre-aggregated documents in a smart way that achieves low query latencies, while using the storage space efficiently.

entry.title: Introducing ThirdEye - LinkedIn’s Business-Wide Monitoring Platform
entry.id: Introducing ThirdEye - LinkedIn’s Business-Wide Monitoring Platform
entry.summary: ThirdEye is a comprehensive platform for real-time monitoring of metrics that covers a wide variety of use-cases.

entry.title: Engineering Restaurant Manager - UberEATS Analytics Dashboard
entry.id: Engineering Restaurant Manager - UberEATS Analytics Dashboard
entry.summary: Restaurant Manager is a comprehensive analytics dashboard and pipeline for our restaurant partners. In this article, we discuss how we architected this analytics platform and its robust data pipeline.

entry.title: Open Sourcing Pinot - Scaling the Wall of Real-Time Analytics
entry.id: Open Sourcing Pinot - Scaling the Wall of Real-Time Analytics
entry.summary: Introducing Pinot which allow to slice and dice across billions of rows in real-time across a wide variety of products

entry.title: A Brief History of Scaling LinkedIn
entry.id: A Brief History of Scaling LinkedIn
entry.summary: LinkedIn started in 2003 with the goal of connecting to your network for better job opportunities. It had only 2,700 members the first week. Fast forward many years, and LinkedIn’s product portfolio, member base, and server load has grown tremendously.
